title: NuGetToolbox Export-Signatures Command Output
description: JSON output schema for the 'export-signatures' command, which extracts public method signatures with XML documentation from a NuGet package. Returns an array of MethodInfo objects with full documentation suitable for LLM/AI consumption.

examples.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string.
examples.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

examples.summary: Deserializes the JSON to a .NET object.
examples.returns: The deserialized object from the JSON string.

examples.summary: Parses a JSON string into a JObject.
examples.returns: A JObject populated from the JSON string.
